title: 3.2 Master Challenge 3
question:
Write a JavaScript program to represent data abstraction in arrays. Create an array named firstArray with the following values:

Create an empty array named secondArray . The values of the secondArray are the values of the firstArray multiplied by 3 . Use the for...of loop to iterate the firstArray and use the push() method to insert the values in the secondArray . Count how many array values are divisible by 9 in the secondArray . Write a pseudocode for the same using the appropriate methods or procedures.
Sample output:

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
